name: Loam Lion
originalText: Loam Lion gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

rulings.text: Loam Lion either gets +1/+2 or it doesn’t. It doesn’t get the bonus for each Forest you control.

text: Loam Lion gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.
